title: Who are the top ten mathematicians of this century, and on which branch of mathematics did they excel? Where can I find their research papers? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is difficult to give a list of such mathematicians. Nevertheless, following names come to my mind. 1 Henri Poincare 2 David Hilbert 3 Srinivasa Ramanujan 4 Alexander Grothendieck 5 John von Neumann 6 Jean Pierre Serre 7 Michael Atiyah 8 Andrew Wiles. 9 Alain Connes 10 John Conway These mathematicians are considered from 1900 to 2000 ( this century has 80 years more to end). Wikipedia entry of each of these gives their contributions in their respective mathematical fields and sources of their research.

1 陈省身chen shen shen，differential geometry 2. andrew wiles, number theory. 3 丘成桐shing tung yau, topology。 4. bruce schneiera, cryptography; 5. daniel bernstein, cryptology. 6. adi shamir, cryptology. 7 jean-piere serre, topology.qian 8. 陶哲轩terence tao , harmonic analysis. 9 陈景润chenjingrun, number theory. 10 alan turing, cryptology. pls find their research papers under each names.
